abstract.p: Arthur E Landau letter comments on May 16 article on recovery of nature from eruption of Mount St Helens

block.p: As a postscript to ''As Mount St. Helens Recovers, Old Wisdom Crumbles'' (May 16), it's worth noting that the National Volcanic Monument is just a few hours from either Seattle or Portland. The sights encountered there rival the Grand Canyon and Meteor Crater in Arizona as examples of nature's power to alter our planet on a vast scale. Mount St. Helens is the experience of a lifetime, and it's a wonderful antidote to too many theme parks.
